name: Slime Dungeon (itch) (AnkyDev Studio)
description:
The Slime Dungeon: Cyan is the first of what I hope to be a serious of dungeon-crawler-like RPGs. You must navigate a small blue slime through a series of maze like rooms, defeating enemies along the way. I hope you enjoy this little game!

**WARNING**

While using the web version of the Slime Dungeon Cyan, you may encounter unexpected errors, especially slight visual bugs. This game was not built for the web, but was still uploaded here for your convenience. Pressing exit while in web mode will cause problems too. Again, this game was not intended to be run in-browser.
